project_name: Real-Time Chat and Video Calling Application

items.title: Real-Time Text Messaging
items.description: Enable users to send and receive text messages instantly in one-on-one and group chats.
acceptance_criteria: Messages appear in the chat window within 1 second of being sent
Messages are delivered in correct chronological order
Users can see when the other party is typing
non_functional: Latency under 1 second for message delivery

items.title: Video Calling Feature
items.description: Allow users to initiate and receive high-quality video calls in real time.
acceptance_criteria: Users can start a video call from a chat window
Video and audio streams connect within 3 seconds
Video quality adjusts dynamically based on network conditions
Users can mute/unmute audio and enable/disable video during the call
dependencies: WebRTC or equivalent video streaming service
non_functional: Support for at least 720p video resolution
Secure encrypted communication for audio and video streams

notes: Assumed the requirement includes both one-on-one and group chat capabilities, as well as dynamic video quality adjustment. No explicit mention of platforms (web, mobile) so assumed cross-platform support.
